WRITING.TITLE: [Chest Rotation] I posted asking about the chest pattern, some were unsure. I can confirm it is.
WRITING.TEXT:
Original post https://www.reddit.com/r/ClashRoyale/comments/4cljy3/is_there_really_a_chest_cycle_2_giant_chests/
As had been predicted in that thread. At 203 in the pattern i received my magical chest earlier. This was helpful because I opted not to try new decks and ensure I remained in arena 7. Hope this helps others.
Confirmed. Got the chest exactly as predicted
If it was super magical you got lucky, if it's a regular magical you're just moving along your regular rotation. Happy cake day bud!
Thanks for this
Game changer
I had to boost my arrows to 7 because I was running into level 9 minion hordes at arena 7.
I'm in the same boat. I have to wait for a level 9 to screw up capitalize on it. Otherwise the best i can manage is a draw.
Which do you use to bait the arrows?
What deck do you use him in?
I'm curious as well. How do you fair vs decks with 1 or 2 buildings?
From what I've understood, those are random and do not disrupt the chest rotation.
Ya I get video driver crash errors from rust. Thanks for the tip, hopefully it helps.
Basically. My next 4 chests well be silver so I have to go update it every 3 hours
I use clash chest tracker for Android

Never mind! See the answer below, I didn't go further into the rotation. There is indeed 2 giants before a magical. After you get 2 of each, you get 2 giant chests and a magical shortly after the 2nd. I'll post back if I get the magical in 13 more chests
Oh thanks, I'll try and hang on I'm arena 7 then :)

WRITING.TITLE: Is there really a chest cycle? 2 giant chests
WRITING.TEXT: Hey, I was under the impression there was a chest cycle. I was using an app to track where I was in the cycle after I got my giant chest last week. I was due for a magical one in 80 chests but I just got another giant chest which was not due for another 120 chests. What gives?

Never! http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=vI7tWd7B3iI

WRITING.TITLE: [Suggestion] Ability to browse decks and other screens while waiting for friendly battle
WRITING.TEXT: Right now when your waiting for someone to accept your battle request there isn't much you can do other than type messages. It would be nice to browse your cards or check other stuff. Would be really cool if you could watch other battles while waiting.

I'll just stick to prince then. I faced a double prince deck that was level 3 and pulled out a win thanks to the counters you described. I'm going to invest in more prince cards next sale I see. I'm enjoying this deck because it's a good break from hog freeze.

Once you see how fast USB-C charges your phone, you'll never think about wireless charging again. Oh my phone's at 35%? I'll just plug it in 30 mins before heading out... suddenly it's back up to 80% which lasts a significant amount of time.
A mix of light and dark green. I'm on cataclysm ROM, no Facebook app. Phone auto switches to battery saver from 12am to 6am

This basically. I never bother checking because I go from 8am to 11pm with ~30% remaining. I don't charge it overnight so I'm up the next morning at 6am with 28% battery left which get me to work where I'll charge it to full.
Uhh sort of? Under the a good amount of light at a certain angle i can sort of a see a hint of a darker ring? I'm sure it'll come off if i clean it, but it's not really an issue.

It plays well into one of the theories about Rey being his daughter that was assumed dead, but in fact Kylo hid her from Luke because he couldn't go through with killing her at the academy. So what you're seeing is Luke realizing she's alive and him on the brink of crying. The only flaw here is Rey not knowing he's her father, but this could be countered by Kylo screwing with her mind at a young age.
